name: Translation
about: Contribute or request a Spanish translation
title: '[Translation] '
labels: translation, spanish
assignees: ''
---

## What Needs Translation

Which page, policy, or UI element needs translation?

## Translation Type

- [ ] UI strings (in `src/i18n/es.json`)
- [ ] Policy title and summary (frontmatter fields)
- [ ] Full policy content
- [ ] Other

## Proposed Translation

If you're providing a translation, include it here. Native speakers and professional translators are especially welcome.

## Notes

Any context about tone, terminology, or regional language considerations.
